description:
Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

The Only Offline Bible app with :

 ** Crystal clear, high quality audio and complete audio in

- Asante Twi Offline Audio
- Akuapem Twi Offline Audio
- Ga Offline Audio
- Fante Offline Audio
- English Offline Audio

(We spent years recording these full Old and New Testaments audio in a professional studio. Listen to it for free. Grow your faith and get you closer to God ) 

 **10 in 1 bible app with option to read side by side, containing:

-Asante Twi Bible
-Akuapem Twi Bible
-Ga Bible
-Fante Bible
-English Bible


 ** Offline Old & New Testament Scriptures in Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Ga, Ga–Dangme/Ga-Adangbe, Fante,  English - King James Version (KJV) etc


 ** Offline Old & New Testament Audio in Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Ga, Ga–Dangme/Ga-Adangbe, Fante,  English - King James Version (KJV) etc. Audio can be listened offline & is completely free

 ** Option to read scriptures in parallel mode:
Parallel - Asante Twi and English Side by side
Parallel - Akuapem Twi and English Side by side
Parallel - Ga and English Side by side
Parallel - Fante and English Side by side
Single - Asante only
Single - Akuapem Twi only
Single - Ga only
Single - Fante only


 ** The only Ghana Bible app that speaks to you! High quality audio allows the Bible to be read to you out loud in Ghanaian Akuapem Twi, Asante Twi, Ga, Fante & English languages

 ** Automatic scrolling feature allows the bible app to scroll automatically and highlight verses when audio is being played

 ** Highlight  scriptures, bookmark verses & save sections of scriptures & verses in any color

 ** Add your own notes, record church service, add commentaries, twi preachings, twi audio and more

 ** Get encouraged with Bible chats, daily devotional messages, motivational verses and inspirational verses to help you in your day to day life and overcome life obstacles

 ** Change font size, font style, switch to night mode or day mode etc

**  Social Network - Make friends, Chat with Others

Introducing the ultimate Bible app for Ghanaians – a deep and immersive dive into God's word that bridges the beauty of tradition with modern technology. Explore the scriptures like never before in Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Fante, Ga, and English, ensuring that every Ghanaian, no matter their linguistic background, feels God's word resonate in their soul.

Our dedication to authenticity and connection is evident. Beyond just text, we've incorporated complete offline audio in all these languages. This ensures that regardless of where you are – whether it's the golden shores of Cape Coast, the bustling streets of Accra, the historic realms of Ashanti, or the tranquil hills of Akuapem – God's teachings are always within reach, even without internet access.

This best Ghanaian app comes with complete offline use and supports audio in the Ghanaian Akan language Asante twi and Akuapem twi. The Ga language, The Fante language and English language. You can read in parallel mode  or read in single mode. Backed by the personal digital artificial intelligent Abena AI can automatically read scriptures to your hearing, scroll verses intelligently and read out devotions and daily verses to you. Just select the chapter and verse and Abena AI will recite it for you. You can also record live church services! 

It's the best Asante Twi Bible, Akuapem Twi Bible, Fante Bible, Ga Bible and English Bible all  for free. Contains nkwa asem, Ghanaian Ashanti languages, eastern region Akuapem languages

This super twi bible allows you to highlight and bookmark any part of scriptures like you would in real life, add personal notes and sermons, copy, paste, share scriptures with friends and family


The different reading modes offers a great educational experience, dictionary translator and reference point to learn Ghana’s most widely spoken languages Twi, Ga, Fante, English

Don't forget to leave us a review :)

"Pray Daily" is your invitation to a deeper, more meaningful relationship with the Divine. Immerse yourself in a spiritual haven, where every tap, every scroll, every interaction brings you one step closer to the heart of God. Designed for the devoted soul, this app seamlessly combines time-tested scriptures with modern functionalities to guide, inspire, and enlighten.

Deepen Your Connection Through Prayer
Harness the profound power of prayer. With "Pray Daily," every morning ushers in hope, and every night brings solace. Our extensive database of verses ensures that your conversations with God are always heartfelt and sincere, allowing you to express your most profound feelings, aspirations, and desires with ease.

Elevate Your Scripture Reading Experience
"Pray Daily" has been built to enhance your scripture reading. Revel in the divine teachings, customize your reading experience, and let the words of the Lord resonate. From adding notes to highlighting significant passages, and from listening to calming Bible audios during daily commutes to having His word guide you even without an internet connection, the scriptures have never been this accessible.

AI Priest - The Fusion of Faith & Technology
In moments of doubt, introspection, or simply seeking understanding, turn to our advanced AI Priest. This modern marvel, powered by cutting-edge technology and infused with biblical wisdom, stands ready to assist, advise, and guide you in all spiritual matters.

Challenge and Relax with Bible Trivia
Add a dose of fun to your spiritual journey. Dive into our extensive collection of Bible trivia, quizzes, and challenges. Perfect for both ardent Bible scholars and those seeking a relaxed yet enlightening activity. Every quiz brings a new opportunity to learn, reflect, and grow.

Structured Spiritual Growth
Guidance is paramount in one's journey of faith. Our selection of Bible plans is curated to cater to diverse needs. Be it deepening understanding, seeking emotional healing, or simply walking a path of enlightenment, "Pray Daily" has a plan tailored just for you.

A Global Church Experience
Our interactive Bible games not only provide moments of relaxation but also reward you with captivating views of sacred sanctuaries from across the globe. Each jigsaw puzzle piece you collect unlocks a new perspective, a new beacon of faith.

Chronicle Every Step with God
Your spiritual journey is precious. With "Pray Daily," every insight, every revelation, and every heartfelt prayer is preserved, letting you revisit and reflect upon these cherished moments anytime.

Key Features:

A rich, immersive prayer platform for conversations with God.
Extensive personalization in scripture reading.
Instant guidance with the AI Priest feature.
Engaging Bible trivia to test and expand your knowledge.
Curated Bible study plans to guide your spiritual journey.
Unlock breathtaking visuals of churches worldwide.
Detailed logs and records of your spiritual milestones.

Join a global community of believers, deepening their faith, and drawing closer to God every day. Download "Pray Daily" now.

[Subscription]

Weekly VIP Membership offers weekly subscription for US$1.99, Monthly VIP Membership offers monthly subscription for US$4.99, and Yearly VIP Membership offers yearly subscription for US$29.99 with 3 days free trial, you can cancel the subscription before the free trial converted to the paid subscription, or you will be automatically renewed and charged every period. The price is shown in United States Dollar, actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. You can cancel your subscriptions anytime by going to your account settings in App Store.

More information about Subscription: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Discover the power of words with the Oxford Dictionary, the definitive language resource trusted by millions around the world. This comprehensive app, powered by Oxford Languages, offers a wealth of linguistic tools to help you achieve your language goals.

■ 15 OXFORD DICTIONARIES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: 
•	Access a vast collection of dictionaries for English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Italian, Hindi, Urdu, Portuguese, Japanese, Greek, Bulgarian, and Thai.

■ UNMATCHED LANGUAGE CONTENT:
•	The Latest Word Database from Oxford Languages
•	Explore over 1 million words, phrases, and definitions
•	Thesaurus Integration - find the perfect word with thousands of synonyms and antonyms
•	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation with high-quality voice recordings
•	Etymology and Origins - uncover the fascinating histories behind words
•	Specialised Content - quickly locate topic-specific references
•	Word of the Day - expand your vocabulary one word at a time

■ KEY FEATURES AND INTUITIVE DESIGN:
•	Favourites - save and organize words into personalized folders
•	Recent - quickly revisit recently searched words
•	Auto-correction option - correct the spelling of any word, as you type it 
•	Spread the word! Share your linguistic discoveries with friends, colleagues, or on social media

■ ADVANCED SEARCH OPTIONS:
•	Search autocomplete - displays predictions as you type
•	Keyword lookup - search within compound words and phrases
•	Camera search - look up words in the camera viewfinder
•	Voice and fuzzy search - find an entry when you don’t know how a word is spelled

■ THE OXFORD DICTIONARY IS IDEAL FOR:
•	Professionals improving workplace communication
•	Writers and journalists crafting impactful content  
•	Students preparing for tests like IELTS, TOEFL, ACT, SAT, or NAPLAN
•	Academics and specialists requiring accurate, field-specific terminology 
•	Word enthusiasts and vocabulary builders  

■ UPGRADE TO PREMIUM AND UNLOCK MORE: 
-	Unlimited Database Access - search without limits
-	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation
-	Offline and Fast mode - access the wealth of the word database anywhere, anytime - no data or internet connection is required 
-	Thesaurus - access your word arsenal for millions of synonyms and antonyms 
-	Regular Update - stay current with the latest language trends and word entries
-	Ad-Free Experience - focus on learning without distractions

■ WHY CHOOSE OXFORD DICTIONARY?
•	Accuracy and Reliability - trusted by language experts and learners worldwide
•	Comprehensive Coverage - from casual word lovers to academics, this app has it all
•	User-Friendly Design - a seamless experience for all
•	Your Language Journey Starts Here

Download the Oxford Dictionary today and embark on a journey of linguistic discovery. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply curious about language, this app is your ultimate language companion.

Free beautiful daily bible verse of the day in KJV translation helps you to inspire your faith everyday. Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse reminds you to talk with God everyday by reading the bible verse of the day and you are also allowed to create your own bible verse collection, audio bibles, and private notes.
 
THE GREAT FREE BIBLE STUDY TOOL
- Access King James Version Bible anytime anywhere by swiping screen corner
- Off to a good start with an inspiring Bible verse of the day 
- Easy verse copying and pasting
- Study KJV Bible Offline

- Search the holy bible king james version with keywords

CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN KJV BIBLE FOR FREE

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:

• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly

Phone Cleaner,Easy to use！Small size, many functions, download and use, learn more!
【 Photo album 】

1. Blurry pictures: Look for blurry photos in your album and delete those that are useless but take up space.
2. Oversized pictures: Some pictures actually need dozens of MB! ? Find them and delete them to give the album a little more space!
3. Screenshots of mobile phones: Now there are more and more screenshots in mobile phones, it doesn't matter if you can't delete them, find them all at once and solve them all!
4. Duplicate pictures: a picture accidentally downloaded many times, a lens accidentally shot many, delete it, leave one of the most satisfied on the line.

【 Album video 】

1. Oversized video: Suddenly running out of storage space on your phone? Do you have a lot of movies stored? One delete done!
2. Duplicate videos: I take a lot of videos of my family, but many of them are the same, it's okay, delete them.
3. Bad video: Many videos downloaded can not play? The original is damaged, delete and re-download!


【 Privacy Album 】
Encrypt albums, save pictures, do not upload to the cloud space, save applications locally, and delete applications with caution

【 Cloud storage 】
Secure cloud storage, large capacity
Regular users: 50MB

developer: Maria de los Llanos Goig Monino
description:
The New International Version (NIV) app, the best NIV Bible Offline in English translation.

The New International Version (NIV) is an English translation of the Bible first published in 1978 by Biblica (formerly the International Bible Society). The NIV was published to meet the need for a modern translation done by Bible scholars using the earliest, highest quality manuscripts available. Of equal importance was that the Bible be expressed in broadly understood modern English.

NIV Bible Offline in English, the best App to carry God’s Word. Have the Holy Bible at your fingertips anytime and anywhere you go. This NIV Bible Offline in English contains the Old Testament and New Testament, providing an easier way to feel God’s word in your heart and to feel heaven closer to you and your loved ones. Carry The Holy Version App wherever and whenever you want to help enlighten your mind with the most complete, fast and easy to use daily Bible App.

The New International Version consists of 39 books in the Old Testament (Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers,Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, 1 Samuel, 2 Samuel, 1 Kings, 2 Kings, 1 Chronicles, 2 Chronicles, Ezra, Nehemiah, Esther, Job, Psalms, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, Song of Solomon, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Ezekiel, Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi) and 27 books in the New Testament (Matthew, Mark, Luke, John, Acts, Romans, Corinthians 1 and 2, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, 1 Thessalonians, 2 Thessalonians, 1 Timothy, 2 Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, James, 1 Peter, 2 Peter, 1 John, 2 John, 3 John, Jude, Revelation)

BENEFITS of NIV Bible Offline in English - New International Version:

- Access to years from NIV in english.
- Complete with all chapters of Old and New testament
- Read Offline : Read Bible even without internet access other Bibles can’t do that!
- User Friendly Interface : Simple but powerful design for easy to use. Browse by books or chapters.
- You can copy the texts of the App and share them.
- Perfect for people who wants to learn the NIV Bible.
- Easy to use, with your face and still being able to use it, you will need internet access.
- Portable to use. No more book. Go with you everywhere
- Allows you to move between chapters.
- Orientation Support (Portrait, Landscape)
- Possibility of increasing or decreasing the size of the letter of the text
- Share verses via multiple platforms with ease, like Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Weibo, WhatsApp, Skype, etc..

It is not enough just to be Christian, it is necessary to have a New International Bible application installed on your cell phone!

In this application you will find what you need for your Soul !!!

The app NIV Bible Offline in English - New International Version also contains:

- Theology Dictionary: Completely offline so that you can consult when you want all the definitions and terms about theology.
-Bible Verses By Topic.
- Questions about Theology: A lot of questions and answers that will expand our knowledge about our Lord and his Word.
- Bible Survey.
- Bible studies in depth.
- Devotionals.
- Additional features.

Download the NIV Bible Offline in English - New International Version and start your day fresh with a daily verse and carry your soft-copy of the NIV Bible with you anytime and anyplace you are or wish to go, and share God's Word to spread light and love to your close ones. This App offers immaculate friendly features that will make your daily Bible reading a wonderful experience.

Have a nice time learning the word of the Lord and reflecting with our APP NIV Bible study Offline.

We are looking forward to your feedback and any suggestions for improvement.

Welcome to Twi bible Asante Offline & complete Audio from Genesis to revelation.
You don’t have to strain your eyes and read the Bible because from Genesis to Revelation is being read. This reading is not typical Twi reading, but modern reading.
Brethren, this is the Twi Bible Asante you are looking for with great features.
There is no other Twi Bible with complete audio Clean and perfect than this. Versions.
The FASTEST Twi Bible app and most efficient way to read & study the Bible. Quickly navigate to any verse and easily access tools to help further your understanding of the Bible.
Immerse yourself in the rich and profound teachings of the Bible with the Twi Bible & Audio app. This comprehensive and user-friendly application is crafted specifically for Twi-speaking individuals, offering a seamless experience for exploring the sacred scriptures. Whether you're at home, on the go, or attending church, this app serves as your spiritual companion, bringing the Word of God to life in the palm of your hands.
Key Features:
•	Complete Twi Bible Text: Access the entire Bible translated into Twi, allowing you to read, study, and reflect on the scriptures at your own pace. Dive into the Old and New Testaments with ease, and navigate through chapters effortlessly.
•	Audio Narration: Experience the power of the spoken word with our high-quality audio narration. Listen to the Bible being read aloud, enhancing your understanding and creating a deeper connection to the teachings. Perfect for those who prefer auditory learning or for moments when reading is not feasible.
•	Verse-by-Verse Navigation: Easily navigate through the Bible, verse by verse, with a user-friendly interface. Quickly find and bookmark your favorite passages, allowing you to revisit and meditate on them whenever you desire.
•	Search and Discover: Use the search feature to find specific verses, chapters, or keywords within the Twi Bible. Discover relevant passages that speak to your current thoughts, concerns, or spiritual inquiries.
•	Daily Devotional Plans: Enhance your daily spiritual practice with curated devotional plans. These plans guide you through selected scriptures, fostering a habit of regular reflection and meditation on the Word of God.
•	Personalized Settings: Tailor your app experience with customizable settings, including font size, background color, and audio playback speed. Make the app uniquely yours to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable reading and listening experience.
•	Offline Access: Download your favorite passages and audio content for offline access, ensuring that you can stay connected to the Word of God even when you're without an internet connection.
Embark on a journey of spiritual growth and enlightenment with the Twi Bible & Audio app. Whether you're a devoted follower seeking daily inspiration or someone curious about the teachings of the Bible, this app is designed to enrich your life with the timeless wisdom and guidance found in scripture.
FEATURES:
• Take Notes offline
• Highlight or Underline words & entire verses
• Bookmark Verses
• Add Margin Notes
• Full Screen Immersive Mode by a simple double tap 
• Folders to organize your notes & bookmarks
• Offline (No Internet connection required for downloaded Bibles)
• Search the Old & New Testament to find verses containing the entered keyword
• Split-screen mode to read two Bible translations at once (Twi and English)
• Share verses & notes via, Facebook, Twitter, email, & SMS etc
• Bible talks to you! Complete twi bible with complete audio.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.
مشاركة في وسائل الإعلام الاجتماعية

● iPad friendly interface

Unlock the Power of Words with English Dictionary: The Best Free Offline English Dictionary & Thesaurus

Welcome to English Dictionary, where words come alive! Designed to be your ultimate language companion, our app offers a comprehensive English to English dictionary, enriched with a plethora of features to enhance your learning experience. Whether you're a language enthusiast, a curious learner, or someone looking to refine their vocabulary, English Dictionary is tailored just for you, and it's absolutely free!

FEATURES AT A GLANCE:

English Meanings & More: Dive deep into the ocean of English language. Get clear, concise meanings, and explore how words come to life in different contexts. Our app doesn't just stop at definitions; it guides you through the various uses of words as nouns, verbs, adjectives, and more, complete with examples to illustrate their usage in sentences.

Voice & Keyboard Search: Ease of access is paramount. With English Dictionary, find the meanings of words effortlessly using both keyboard and voice input. Speak a word and let the app unveil its secrets. It's that easy, making your learning journey smoother and more enjoyable.
Synonyms & Antonyms: Enhance your vocabulary by exploring a treasure trove of synonyms and antonyms. Perfect for writers, students, and anyone looking to add more depth to their language skills.

Thesaurus Feature: Navigate through words alphabetically in our intuitive thesaurus. It's a haven for those who love to explore different facets of the English language, making learning not just informative but fun.

Unlock Global Language Insights with Translation: Elevate your language learning and understanding to a global level with English Dictionary's translation feature. Not only can you discover the depth of English words, but you can also translate them into a variety of languages with just a tap. Whether you're looking to translate a single word or dive deeper by translating its usage examples, synonyms, and antonyms, our app has you covered. This feature is perfect for learners, travelers, and language enthusiasts aiming to bridge communication gaps and enrich their linguistic knowledge across cultures.

Bookmark Words: Stumbled upon a fascinating new word? Bookmark it for quick access later! Our bookmarking feature ensures that your newfound knowledge is always just a tap away.

Search History: Revisit your learning journey anytime with our search history feature. Keep track of the words you've explored, making it easy to review and reinforce your learning.

Learn & Grow: With English Dictionary, every interaction is an opportunity to learn something new. From mastering the basics to exploring complex concepts, our app supports your growth at every step with easy-to-understand tutorials and guides.

WHY English Dictionary?

Free & Offline: Access thousands of words, meanings, synonyms, antonyms, and more, all for free and without the need for an internet connection.

User-Friendly: An easy-to-navigate interface combined with powerful features makes learning both effective and enjoyable.

For Everyone: Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone curious about the English language, English Dictionary is designed to meet your needs.

Embark on a journey of linguistic exploration and make English Dictionary your go-to English dictionary and thesaurus. It's not just about finding meanings; it's about discovering the beauty of the English language, one word at a time. 

Download English Dictionary now and unlock the power of words today!
